LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_InsectJelly: This Arachne honeypot species is producing insect honey to nourish the insect colony.
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Medicine.de: Causes the honeypot species to undergo endogenous evolution at the expense of producing Arachne honey, allowing it to hatch medical cocoons and allow the use of medical abilities and manipulation of the phylogenetic species. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Medicine.co: Requires technology Node MED-1 "Healing Seed" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Medicine.de: This Arachne honeypot species has been exalted and no longer produces insect honey. Instead, it regularly produces medicines that are scarce in the nest, and can control parasitic parasites.
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Fuel.label: Honeypot species conversion - flammable chamber
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Fuel.descri: Causes the honeypot species to undergo endogenous evolution, at the expense of producing Arachne honey, so that it can produce chemical fuel, enhance its armor, and give it the additional ability to shoot fire. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
Requires Tech Node FEL-8 "Detonation Chamber" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Fuel.label: Subspecies - deflagration species
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Fuel.descri: This Arachne honeypot species has been enchanted and no longer produces insect honey, but produces the scarce chemical fuel for the nest, and can fight enemies by spraying fire.
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Base.label: Hive Marine
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Base.description: Arachne's warrior bugs can turn their bodies into their most powerful weapons. As technology is unlocked, they will gain access to a variety of skills for use.
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.label: Warrior Type Conversion - Invisible Killer
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.description: Causes the warrior species to evolve internally, greatly impairing its ability to use long-range weapons and special skills in exchange for near-permanent invisibility and powerful melee capabilities. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.comps.CompPrope: Requires technology node CLO-4 "Stalker" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.label: Subspecies - hunter species
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.description: The evolved warrior species has acquired special iris cells covering the whole body. These cells containing nanocrystals can refract light everywhere to achieve a permanent invisible state until they launch an attack. In addition, they have also gained more powerful close-range combat capabilities. The disadvantage is that the degradation of the compound eyes makes it difficult to shoot.
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.label: Warrior species conversion - gene thief
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.description: The warrior species undergoes endogenous evolution, compromising its combat capabilities and ability to use skills, in exchange for the ability to steal genes from the enemy and inject genes into its own colonists. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.comps.CompProper: Requires technology Node STL-5 "Gene Stealing" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.label: Subspecies-Aberration
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.description: The mutants are a mobile gene pool. They no longer have the job of licking blood among the swarms, but focus on purifying the high-quality genes of prisoners and slaves and giving them to high-quality individuals in the zerg.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Base.label: Living cigarette can
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Base.description: The Mist Seeds are the big guys among the Arachne Zerg. They not only have thick shells, but their abdomens filled with pheromone smoke can emit gas that covers the battlefield, attracting smaller auxiliary insects to break out of the ground and launch crazy attacks on the enemy.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Production_Bacterium.label: Mist species conversion——Jiu Bacteria Specialization
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Production_Bacterium.descri: Make the mist species undergo endogenous evolution, at the expense of spraying pheromones and reducing armor, so that it can regularly produce the advanced material of the Arachne Zerg - Activated Giant Bacteria. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
Requires technology Node BAC-1 "Breeding" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Production_Bacterium.label: Subspecies-breeding strain
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Production_Bacterium.descri: This Arachne Mist Species has obtained its glory, the front carapace has fallen off and it can no longer emit pheromones, in exchange for the ability to produce activated bacteria. One breeding strain produces 5 servings of activated bacteria every day.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.label: Mist seed conversion - Creep support
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.description: Make the mist species undergo endogenous evolution, at the expense of ejecting pheromones, so that they can gain additional defense, movement speed, and the ability to lay mushroom carpets in a large area and at high speeds. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.comps.CompPropertie: Requires technology node CRP-3 "Crop Laying" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.label: Subspecies-king species
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.description: This Arachne Mist Seed has been granted Bazhao and can move around while laying down creep to transform the terrain around its lair or establish a path to invade other settlements. In addition, it also gained the ability to project fungi at enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Base.label: hard carapace
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Base.description: Although the shield-headed species is smaller and does not feel as oppressive as the large Arachne Zerg, its defense is no weaker than those of the large Zerg due to the carapace covering its body.
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.label: Shieldhead Conversion—Hive Guard
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.description: The shield-headed species undergo endogenous evolution, at the expense of its ability to produce chitin and build buildings, so that it can acquire more powerful combat capabilities, movement capabilities, and collision attack skills. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.comps.CompPrope: Requires technology Node VTE-1 "Guardian" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.label: Subspecies-nest guard species
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.description: This Arachne shield-headed creature has gained brilliance, making its combat abilities even more powerful and allowing it to attack opponents with powerful rams.
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.label: Shieldhead Conversion - Master Builder
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.description: This causes the shield-headed species to undergo endogenous evolution, allowing it to acquire more powerful chitin production capabilities and construction skills at the expense of its defense capabilities. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.comps.CompPro: Requires Technology Node CON-3 "Builder" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.label: Subspecies-constructed species
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.description: This Arachne shield-headed species has been granted glory and has strong output and construction capabilities. A shieldhead species produces an additional 15 copies of chitin per day.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Base.label: Flying behemoth
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Base.description: Rulers of the sky, the Arachne Skyborn are large but agile and deadly creatures, capable of carrying large weapons while possessing maneuverability that few others can match. They can forcefully carry their own Zerg that has not yet fallen to the ground to enhance the mobility of the slow Zerg on the battlefield.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.label: Transformation of Sky and Sky Species—Lord of Brood Insects
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.description: The aerial species undergo endogenous evolution, at the cost of reduced mobility and loss of high-altitude maneuverability, allowing them to gain the ability to automatically project sky-nesting auxiliary insects at the enemy - these auxiliary insects are small in size and will cling to the enemy with annoying melee combat. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.comps.CompPropert: Requires technology node LOD-6 "Hive Master" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.label: Subspecies-Lord Species
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.description: This Arachne Sky Seed has obtained Bazhao, and will throw Sky Nest Seed auxiliary insects at the enemy. These sensitive auxiliary insects will scatter around to hunt the target after landing.
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.label: Space-to-sky transformation - electromagnetic storm
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.description: The aerospace species undergo endogenous evolution, at the cost of reduced mobility and loss of high-altitude maneuverability, allowing it to gain the ability to automatically project magnetic storm species auxiliary insects at the enemy - this auxiliary insect will release EMP in a suicide attack to fight against the mechanical race. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.comps.CompPrope: Requires technology Node WID-9 "Magnetic Storm" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.label: Subspecies-Hurricane species
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.description: This Arachne Sky Seed has obtained Bazhao, and will throw Magnetic Storm Seed auxiliary insects at the enemy. These auxiliary insects will scatter after landing, and release EMP in a suicidal attack to fight against the enemy mechanical race.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Base.label: Queen's Throat
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Base.description: The Arachne Guards are agents of will personally cultivated by the Queen. Not only do they have superb shooting skills, but they can also command friendly troops on the battlefield to make them stronger.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.label: Guard species conversion—Pilot Lighthouse
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.description: The guard species undergo endogenous evolution, sacrificing their shooting ability, jumping ability, and commanding ability in exchange for the ability to command aerial beasts and insects. \n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible! Additionally, the Aerial Beast must be successfully airborne in order to be commanded - by the time you unlock this evolution path, the Aerial Beast should not be buildable yet.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.comps.CompPrope: Requires technology Node NAV-9 "Navigator" to unlock evolution
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.label: Subspecies - pilot species
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.description: This Arachne Guard species has obtained the Bahyao. Although it has lost its direct combat ability, it can command the aerial beasts and insects and crush the enemy with the absolute air superiority of the insect swarms.
LanguageData.ARA_Slayer_Base.label: The violent beast
LanguageData.ARA_Slayer_Base.description: Arachne is a special kind of beast insect. Compared with its brothers and sisters, its intelligence level is much lower, but it has also gained advantages that other insect races cannot match - its huge size and thick carapace, which allows it to withstand all attacks and serve as a heavy hammer to smash the enemy's defensive positions.
